comments.body: This issue latest notification was not sent due to JIRA mail setting. Fixed now. Please check the issue for latests changes.
Verified fixed with SDK 1.9.0.v20120212011634 Droid 3 (2.3.4) and Nexus S (2.2.2) as well as emulator with both Rhino and V8 runtimes.
